channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- vSphere Data Protection (VDP)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- vSphere Data Protection (VDP)

item.title: CVE-2017-4917|2024-08-05T14:47:42.912Z -- vmware -- vsphere%20data%20protection%20%28vdp%29
item.description: VMware vSphere Data Protection (VDP) 6.1.x, 6.0.x, 5.8.x, and 5.5.x locally stores vCenter Server credentials using reversible encryption. This issue may allow plaintext credentials to be obtained.

item.title: CVE-2017-4914|2024-08-05T14:47:43.209Z -- vmware -- vsphere%20data%20protection%20%28vdp%29
item.description: VMware vSphere Data Protection (VDP) 6.1.x, 6.0.x, 5.8.x, and 5.5.x contains a deserialization issue. Exploitation of this issue may allow a remote attacker to execute commands on the appliance.
